title: Trimming, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, copper wire
Technique: woven
description: Galloon with attached fringe. Galloon has a design of diagonally placed ornaments. Fringe has a heading and skirts threads that are twisted, looped and tied with a running thread to support flower-like ornaments. Decorated with pendants.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 17th century.Medium: silk, copper wire
Technique: woven. 1905-2-207.
